divs: Sighting Detailswas on my way to the store and looked up into the sky and notice an object which we've seen on sever different sightings. so i ran to get my dad and brothers and a pair of binoculars. focused in and noticed there was actually two objects spinning around one another and were traveling south-west to north-east but when following the flight pattern changed and jumped to spot to spot till we lost sight. when trying to findit my dad spotted a different object close to the original object first spotted. he focused in and was completely different craft. he said it was a slightly elongated, round with a flat bottom, and appeared to be a light of transparent window in the front. we tracked the object a little bit more til it disappeared from sight.
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in West Covina
There were no other sightings in West Covina on or around May 1st 2010
